newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5430/5440 FXSU.
newsitem.headline: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5430/5440 FXSU.

text.p: The Russian Central Bank said it had set 5430/5440 roubles per dollar as its bid and offer rates for its operations on the currency market on Friday.
The official rate for Saturday will be 5435.
On Thursday the bid/offer rates were 5429/5439, with the official dollar rate 5434 from Friday.
The Central Bank announces daily bid/offer dollar/rouble rates for its currency operations. The midpoint of these rates is the official dollar/rouble rate for the following day.
The daily corridor for the rouble on the interbank market is 5298/5898 after 5295/5895.
